entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @RepLeeZeldin @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse A study of Covid-19 patients in American veterans’ hospitals suggests anti-malarial drugs can’t beat the virus: those treated with hydroxychloroquine died at a greater rate than those not given the drug. President Trump has promoted it. His public-health agency did not. https://t.co/Jlx27n9D7F
